collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
This page informs you of our policies regarding the collection, use, and
disclosure of personal data when you use our Service and the choices you have
associated with that data.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
By using the Service, you
agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
Unless otherwise defined in this Privacy Policy, the terms used in this
Privacy Policy have the same meanings as in our Terms and Conditions,
accessible from https://cleanuri.com

## Information Collection And Use

We collect several different types of information for various purposes to
provide and improve our Service to you.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
### Types of Data Collected

#### Personal Data

While using our Service, we may ask you to provide us with certain personally
identifiable information that can be used to contact or identify you
("Personal Data").

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
Personally identifiable information may include, but is not
limited to:

  * Cookies and Usage Data

#### Usage Data

We may also collect information on how the Service is accessed and used
("Usage Data").

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
This Usage Data may include information such as your
computer's Internet Protocol address (e.g.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
IP address), browser type, browser
version, the pages of our Service that you visit, the time and date of your
visit, the time spent on those pages, unique device identifiers and other
diagnostic data.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
#### Tracking & Cookies Data

We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track the activity on our
Service and hold certain information.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
Tracking technologies also used are beacons, tags, and scripts
to collect and track information and to improve and analyze our Service.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
* **Google Analytics**

Google Analytics is a web analytics service offered by Google that tracks and
reports website traffic.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
Google uses the data collected to track and monitor
the use of our Service.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
We do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from anyone
under the age of 18.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence:
If we
become aware that we have collected Personal Data from children without
verification of parental consent, we take steps to remove that information
from our servers.
